summary: Spoof horror in which a group of college kids do a semester abroad in Romania and realise that if the partying doesn't kill them, the vampires just might!
cast: Oren Skoog|Josh Miller|Pat Casey|Jennifer Lyons|Tony Denman|Patrick Cavanaugh|Paul Hansen Kim|David Steinberg|Natalie Garza|Nicole Garza|Musetta Vander|James DeBello|Irena Violette|Claudiu Trandafir|Radu Andrei Daniel|Simon Petric|Dorin Andone|Dorina Lazar|Desiree Malonga|Radita Rosu|Adriana Butoi|Corneliu Jipa|Damian Oancea|Cristian Popa|Elena-Cristina Marchisano|Stefan Alexa|Adrian Anghel|Choice J. Skinner|Dorin Zaharia|Scott Brandon|Maia van Kline|Dana Lee|Annette Charles|Mo Anouti|Colin Campbell|Mitch Hara|Ashley Barron|Carey Embry|Paul Zies|Kommerina DeYoung|Bonnie Morgan|Jessica Mei Gershen|Brett Gipson|Mandinga|Jonathan Perkins
title: Transylmania
